domain_description: You will be asked to listen to 20 audio clips of classical compositions, and asked to identify the composer.

task 01.description: indicate the classical composer who created the following melody.
task 01.possible_answers: "johannes brahms, frederic chopin, jules massenet, johann sebastian bach, carl orff"
